title: American Airlines Cancels Hundreds More Flights
sub_head: The carrierâ€™s Monday and weekend troubles follow similar turmoil at rivals Spirit and Southwest
body:
American Airlines Group Inc . canceled hundreds of additional flights on Monday, facing more of the trouble that began during the weekend as it struggles to meet growing travel demand with a staff reduced in size because of the Covid-19 pandemic.
The airline said it canceled 340 flights as of 11 a.m. ET on Monday, amounting to about 6% of its total flights. The airline scrubbed more than 1,900 flights over the weekend.
